name: PocketEmbedded
summary: Easily integrate Pocket payment into your iOS app with a ready-to-use button
description:
PocketEmbedded is an iOS library that allows developers to quickly integrate Pocket payment functionality into their apps. Features include:

- Prebuilt Pocket payment button with embedded logo
- Deeplink support for seamless payment flow
- Ready-to-use in both storyboard and code
- Customizable button appearance and behavior
- Easy integration into any iOS project

Simply add the pod, drag the button into your view, and use the built-in functions to handle Pocket payments.
